title: Hungary Seeks Russian Crude Shipments Via Croatia, Minister Says
description: Hungary requested that Croatia allow the shipment of Russian crude via the Adriatic pipeline while a key route through Ukraine remains blocked.
content: Hungary requested that Croatia allow the shipment of Russian crude via the Adriatic pipeline while a key route through Ukraine remains blocked.
